name: Shaolin Fury
description:
Travel along mystic China with our Shaolin Monk, use his power to cut the bamboo sticks and advance through the fury path.

How to play:

- Hold the screen to cut the bamboo stick to reach the next platform;
- Be precise to avoid falling down;
- Climb the leaderboard and become the next Shaolin Hero!

Each platform you pass you get 1 point. Land the stick precisely on the green dot on top of the platform to double your points.

How long can you endure?
